chat.inputHint: Type @ for context, / for slash commands & workflows, hold shift to drag in files/images

settings.title: Settings
settings.autoApproveTitle: Auto-approve: Read (all), Edit (all), All Commands, Browser, MCP
settings.autoApproveDesc: Let Cline take these actions without asking for approval
settings.notificationsDesc: Show desktop notifications for task completion
settings.telemetryDesc: Help improve Cline by sending anonymous error reports
settings.description: Cline is an AI assistant that can use your CLI and Editor
settings.aboutDescription: An AI assistant that can use your CLI and Editor. Cline can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step with tools that let him create & edit files, explore large projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission).

browser.remoteBrowserHostDesc: URL of remote browser (leave empty for local)

terminal.shellIntegrationTimeoutDesc: Maximum time to wait for shell integration (seconds)
terminal.terminalReuseDesc: Reuse terminal instead of creating new ones
terminal.outputLineLimitDesc: Maximum number of lines to display from terminal output

apiProvider.helpTextOllama: Optional API key for authenticated Ollama instances or cloud services. Leave empty for local installations.

features.cliRequired: Cline for CLI is required for subagents. Install it with:
features.cliAuthDesc: To authenticate with Cline or configure an API provider.
features.subagentsDesc: Experimental: Allows Cline to spawn subprocesses to handle focused tasks like exploring large codebases, keeping your main context clean.
features.checkpointsDesc: Enables extension to save checkpoints of workspace throughout the task. Uses git under the hood which may not work well with large workspaces.
features.mcpMarketplaceDesc: Enables the MCP Marketplace tab for discovering and installing MCP servers.
features.mcpDisplayModeDesc: Controls how MCP responses are displayed: plain text, rich formatting with links/images, or markdown rendering.
features.mcpResponsesCollapsedDesc: Sets the default display mode for MCP response panels
features.reasoningEffortDesc: Reasoning effort for the OpenAI family of models (applies to all OpenAI model providers)
features.strictPlanModeDesc: Enforces strict tool use while in plan mode, preventing file edits.
features.focusChainDesc: Enables enhanced task progress tracking and automatic focus chain list management throughout tasks.
features.focusChainIntervalDesc: Interval (in messages) to remind Cline about its focus chain checklist (1-100). Lower values provide more frequent reminders.
features.autoCompactDesc: Enables advanced context management system which uses LLM based condensing for next-gen models.
features.multiRootDesc: Experimental: Allows cline to work across multiple workspaces.
features.hooksDesc: Experimental: Allows execution of hooks from .clinerules/hooks/ directory.
features.nativeToolCallDesc: Experimental: Allows Cline to call tools through the native API.
features.yoloModeDesc: EXPERIMENTAL & DANGEROUS: This mode disables safety checks and user confirmations. Cline will automatically approve all actions without asking. Use with extreme caution.
features.tokenSavingDesc: Optimize API usage to reduce token consumption and costs. Automatically compresses context, removes redundant information, and uses efficient prompting strategies.
features.tokenSavingLevelDesc: Controls how aggressively to optimize token usage. Higher levels save more tokens but may reduce context quality.
features.smartFileReadingDesc: Intelligently reads files with context awareness. Automatically detects file types, extracts relevant sections, and provides better code understanding by analyzing imports, dependencies, and structure.
features.deepFileAnalysisDesc: Performs advanced file analysis using AST parsing and semantic understanding. Provides detailed insights into code structure, function relationships, type definitions, and potential issues. May increase processing time.
features.aiDiscoveryModeDesc: When starting a new task, AI will ask 3 clarifying questions to better understand your project context, goals, and requirements. Then provides tailored suggestions and recommendations to help both AI and user align on the project direction.
features.question1: What is the main goal of this task?
features.question2: What are the key constraints or requirements?
features.question3: What is your preferred approach or technology stack?
features.showSuggestionsDesc: Display AI-generated suggestions and recommendations after discovery questions
features.advancedCodeUnderstandingDesc: Deep semantic analysis of your codebase using advanced AST parsing, type inference, and dependency graph analysis. Provides better context awareness and more accurate code suggestions.
features.intelligentErrorRecoveryDesc: Automatically detects and recovers from common errors. AI learns from mistakes, suggests fixes, and can rollback changes if needed. Includes smart retry logic and error pattern recognition.
features.contextAwareSuggestionsDesc: Provides intelligent suggestions based on your current file, recent changes, coding patterns, and project structure. Learns from your preferences and adapts recommendations over time.
features.collaborativeCodingModeDesc: Enhanced mode for pair programming with AI. Includes real-time code review, inline comments, step-by-step explanations, and interactive Q&A during development.
features.taskDocumentationDesc: Automatically creates comprehensive documentation for every task. Generates task history file, task plan with subtasks, progress tracking, and debug information. Helps both AI and user monitor progress and work more efficiently.
features.taskHistoryFileDesc: Complete timeline of all actions, decisions, and changes
features.taskPlanFileDesc: Structured plan with base task, subtasks, and checkpoints
features.debugInfoFileDesc: Technical details, errors encountered, and solutions applied
features.progressTrackingDesc: Live updates on task completion percentage and current status
features.autoCondenseDesc: Automatically condense chat history when too long

debug.resetGlobalStateDesc: This will reset all global state and secret storage in the extension.

accountSettings.title: Account
accountSettings.welcomeDesc: Sign in to access your account and manage your credits

chatView.maxFilesReached: Maximum {{max}} images and files per message

welcome.title: What can I do for you?
welcome.tooltip: I can develop software step-by-step by editing files, exploring projects, running commands, and using browsers. I can even extend my capabilities with MCP tools to assist beyond basic code completion.

apiConfig.useDifferentModels: Use different models for Plan and Act modes
apiConfig.useDifferentModelsDesc: Switching between Plan and Act mode will persist the API and model used in the previous mode. This may be helpful e.g. when using a strong reasoning model to architect a plan for a cheaper coding model to act on.

generalSettings.enableNotificationsDesc: Receive system notifications when Cline requires approval to proceed or when a task is completed.
generalSettings.allowTelemetryDesc: Help improve Cline by sending usage data and error reports. No code, prompts, or personal information are ever sent. See our
generalSettings.managedByOrg: This setting is managed by your organization's remote configuration

autoApprove.readProjectFilesDesc: Allow reading files within the project workspace
autoApprove.readAllFilesDesc: Allow reading any file on your system
autoApprove.editProjectFilesDesc: Allow editing files within the project workspace
autoApprove.editAllFilesDesc: Allow editing any file on your system
autoApprove.useBrowserDesc: Allow using the browser to fetch web content
autoApprove.useMcpDesc: Allow using MCP servers for extended functionality
autoApprove.notificationsDesc: Show desktop notifications for task completion
